## コードの例

:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width=55%}
```{{r}}
#| echo: true
library(tidyverse)
my_plt <- midwest |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = area, 
             y = poptotal)) + 
  geom_point(aes(col = state, 
                 size = popdensity)) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "loess") + 
  xlim(c(0, 0.1)) +
  ylim(c(0, 500000)) +
  labs(title = "Area Vs Population",
       x = "Area", 
       y = "Population")
```
:::

::: {.column width=45%}
```{{r}}
#| echo: true
#| fig-width: 5
#| fig-height: 4
plot(my_plt)
```
